addons.title: LinkedIn Workshop Recordings ( Lifetime Access + Updates )
addons.line1: Get Lifetime Access to recordings & Lifetime Updates for ₹499/-
addons.line2: Stay up-to-date with the ever-evolving LinkedIn platform and gain lifetime access to my content updates and recordings! Get all of this for just ₹499/-
addons.line3: PS: I have updated the content 3 times in the last 1 year.
addons.line4: ‍(You should definitely opt-in for this if you're unsure about being available during the workshop timings!)
